nodes.text: The Razor Blades was the third leg of the Dragonbane circuit, following Pillars of the Sky and preceding In a Pinch.

This leg took swoop racers through a broad stretch of marshland. In addition to traps set by the Black Seraphs, the most dangerous obstacles of this leg were tall blades of razor-sharp crystalline grass. More than four meters tall and sharper than a vibroblade, the crystalline grass blades were both beautiful and extremely dangerous.
Walking through this area without protection would result in cuts, and swoopers who crashed here were bound to be cut to pieces.
